title: Only League of Legends crashing whole PC??
body: Hi, ever since the latest patch came out my PC has been crashing hardcore only when I play LoL. Tested this by not playing for a week with no crashes and the first night I played again it crashed mid game. Ive already got an account punishment for it even though I came back and we won the game. I play other games like Rainbow Six Siege and H1Z1 with no problems whatsoever. I am on windows 10, anyone else having this problem or is it just me?

replies.body:
Crashes often happen as a result of poor system driver interactions or hardware issues. I suggest checking out our [Bugspat & Crash Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) for a list of common solutions for this.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
